job.title: Dayforce and Active Directory Integration
job.description:
We are looking for an expert to integrate Dayforce with Active Directory. The project involves seamlessly connecting the two systems to ensure a smooth flow of information and user management between them. The successful candidate should possess the following skills:

- Strong knowledge of Dayforce and Active Directory
- Experience in integrating HRIS and identity management systems
- Proficiency in API integration
- Familiarity with user provisioning and synchronization

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 month or less. We require an expert with a deep understanding of both systems and their integration capabilities. Our company has approximately 2,000 employees.
